name: Ext_R4_Task_ou_value
title: Cross-version Extension for R4.Task.output.value[x] for use in FHIR R5
description: This cross-version extension represents Task.output.value[x] from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Task|4.0.1 for use in FHIR R5.
